dialogue.text: You? You haven't shown any signs of that yet. You're still pushing. Still questioning the shape of the questions.

psychological_notes: The architect acknowledges Evan's unusual stamina for meta-questioning. While most people tire and seek simpler exchanges, Evan continues pushing deeper, even questioning the questions themselves. This endurance marks him as exceptional among the architect's conversational partners.
philosophical_underpinning: Depth requires not just intelligence but persistence
therapeutic_direction: Recognition of client's exceptional engagement capacity
